VIEW.TITLE: Access Control Rule
VIEW.DESCRIPTION: Review the access rule, and if you have the access to do so, add/remove an ACL or modify an existing ACLs properties
VIEW.HELP: Use the control's below to setup the access rule. Make use of the test interface to test your configuration for each scenario.

DOMAIN.LABEL: Domain
DOMAIN.DESCRIPTION: The domain for which this access rule will be created

NAME.LABEL: Name
NAME.DESCRIPTION: The unique name for this access rule
NAME.UNIQUE: The access rule name is not unique for this domain
